<input type="file" name="[[Dev2elementNameFile]]" id="[[Dev2elementNameFile]]" [[accept]] [[toolTip]] [[tabIndex]] [[cssClass]] [[customStyle]]/> 
 [[InjectedLabel]] 
 <div class="fakefile">
 <input type="text" name="[[Dev2elementNameFile]]Fake" id="[[Dev2elementNameFile]]Fake" /> <button type="button" id="[[Dev2elementNameFile]]UploadBtn"> ... </button> [[InjectStar]]
 </div>
</div>
<script>
$("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]").change(function(){ 
 var v = this.value;
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]Fake").val(v);
});
 // hack for custom file upload control
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]").hover(function(){ 
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]Fake").addClass("ui-state-hover"); 
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]UploadBtn").addClass("ui-state-hover"); 
 },
 function(){ 
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]Fake").removeClass("ui-state-hover"); 
 $("#[[Dev2elementNameFile]]UploadBtn").removeClass("ui-state-hover"); 
 }
 );

</script>
